headline.seo: Lessons From a Weight-Loss Camp, on ABC Family
headline.print_headline: Can Girls Be Overweight And Not Be Overwrought?
headline.main: Can Girls Be Overweight and Not Be Overwrought?

docs.lead_paragraph: “Huge,” a drama set at a weight-loss camp, stands in some sympathy with a rebellion mounted against so many hours of “The Biggest Loser.”
docs.snippet: “Huge,” a drama set at a weight-loss camp, stands in some sympathy with a rebellion mounted against so many hours of “The Biggest Loser.”

docs.abstract: Lack of sleep can lead to many medical problems and in rare cases may even prove fatal.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lack of sleep can make getting through the day a challenge and is increasingly tied to a host of medical problems. But can insomnia actually prove fatal? That was among the hundreds of questions recently posed by readers of the Consults blog at "Ask an Expert: Overcoming Insomnia."
docs.snippet: Lack of sleep can lead to many medical problems and in rare cases may even prove fatal.

headline.seo: Alliance Delivers Farm-Fresh Produce to South Bronx Consumers
headline.print_headline: For a Healthier Bronx, A Farm of Their Own
headline.main: For a Healthier Bronx, a Farm of Their Own

docs.lead_paragraph: A new community-supported agriculture program brings upstate produce to the South Bronx — and the potential for residents to own shares in a farm.
docs.snippet: A new community-supported agriculture program brings upstate produce to the South Bronx — and the potential for residents to own shares in a farm.
